name: Bynu Jump
description:
Platformer where you play as a hungry bynu trying to eat some carrots. Made for the Bynu Game Jam hosted by Exuin. Source code and assets are under MIT license.

If you find a bug message me on discord at laws65#3877

Controls:

  • C or space to jump/double jump/wall jump
  • Arrow keys or A and D to move
  • R to restart level

Credits:

  • State machine code: GDQuest
  • Font: Daniel Linssen

Note: Linux export is untested
